pre_text_caption_evidence: other operating/performance and financial statistics we report key railroad performance measures weekly to the association of american railroads ( aar ) , including carloads , average daily inventory of rail cars on our system , average train speed , and average terminal dwell time .
we provide this data on our website at www.up.com/investors/reports/index.shtml .
